content: As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to watch or listen to live performances of Anoushka Shankar. However, Anoushka Shankar is renowned for her live performances and has performed at major venues and festivals around the world. Her performances are known for their energy, virtuosity, and innovation. She often improvises in her live performances and creates new compositions on the spot, which makes every performance unique. If you are a fan of her music, I would definitely suggest checking out some of her live performances, either in person or online.
